name: Operation Bran Flakes
description: Campaign focused on inserting false information into the BPP's web pages to influence Branistan's election.

name: Operation Raisin Bran
description: DDoS attack aimed at overwhelming the BPP’s web servers to disrupt their online operations.

name: APT BPP
description: Advanced persistent threat group known for strategic approach and government-level resources.
objective: target the BPP and undermine Branistan's electoral process

name: APT BPP
description: APT group responsible for Operation Bran Flakes and Operation Raisin Bran.

name: Content Spoofing
description: Technique used by APT BPP to manipulate content on the BPP website.

name: HTTP Flood
description: Technique used by APT BPP in DDoS attacks against the BPP website.

name: Franistan Intelligence
description: Key figures supporting the threat operation against the BPP.

name: Branistan People’s Party (BPP)
description: Target of the cyber operation aimed at disrupting their online operations.
